item.title: C64basicv2
item.description: The Commodore 64 was my first computer, and I became a computer engineer because of it. Today, 40 years after its release, many developers are producing software for this amazing machine. To kill time, I started reading an old book “Creating Arcade Games On The Commodore 64” written by Robert Camp and published in 1984. The book contains many code examples, and when I booted up my c64 to copy this code (as I did when I was a teenager) I realized: I have lost the conveniences of newer editors.

item.title: My city report
item.description: Disclaimer I am a software developer, and am not an infectious disease expert or epidemiologist. This chart was created for study and personal use only. The data is sourced from ASP. This chart should not be used for medical decision making. Chart Data source Scripts

item.title: About me
item.description: I like experimenting, studying new things, reading, photography, drawing relaxes me. Computer science is my greatest passion and my job: this is not always a good thing.
